html:
your covenant with death shall be disannulled. Judah's covenant with Egypt, or death (28:15), will not stand but will be broken, as will the covenant of those in the last days with the mortal arm of flesh.

overflowing scourge. See commentary on 28:15.

trodden down by it. The overflowing scourge that trod upon Judah was the Assyrian army (5:5; 7:25; 10:6).
